title: Optimal Execution & Market Making Simulator
description: Developed a high-frequency trading (HFT) market making simulator using reinforcement learning (RL) to optimize limit order placement, minimizing adverse selection and maximizing inventory control.

title: Statistical Arbitrage & Bayesian Alpha Models
description: Built statistical arbitrage strategies using Bayesian inference and hidden Markov models, identifying mean-reverting asset pairs and backtesting on equities, futures, and crypto data.

title: Machine Learning for Alpha Generation
description: Designed and trained ML models to detect non-linear patterns in market data, combining NLP for sentiment analysis and feature engineering using market microstructure signals.

title: Stochastic Volatility & Option Pricing Models
description: Implemented option pricing models (Heston, SABR) and volatility surface calibration using stochastic differential equations, integrating Monte Carlo methods for risk-neutral pricing.

title: EPQ Carbon Footprint Tracker
description: Built a React Native app for tracking personal carbon emissions as part of my A-Level EPQ. Users can log their daily activities, get carbon footprint estimates, and receive reduction suggestions.

title: Pathfinding & Maze Generation (A-Level NEA)
description: Developed a pathfinding algorithm and maze generation tool using Tkinter for my A-Level Computer Science NEA. Implemented A*, DFS, BFS, Greedy BFS, Kruskal’s, Dijkstra’s, Binary Tree, and Recursive Division algorithms.

title: Stock Market Analysis & Sentiment Tracker
description: Created a Python tool that scrapes financial news, analyzes sentiment using NLP, and correlates it with stock price movements to identify potential trading signals.

title: Crypto Price Tracker & Portfolio Management
description: Built a Python Flask web app that tracks real-time cryptocurrency prices, calculates portfolio returns, and alerts users about significant price movements.

title: AI-Powered Sudoku Solver
description: Developed a backtracking-based Sudoku solver in Python, with a GUI built using Tkinter. Extended it with an AI approach using constraint satisfaction algorithms.

title: Simple Algorithmic Trading Bot
description: Implemented a basic algorithmic trading bot that executes trades based on moving average crossovers and RSI signals, backtested on historical market data.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed this website using React and TypeScript, showcasing my projects, skills, and experience in software development and quantitative finance.
